bean.description: 根据商品Id 和 区域Id 查询该货物配送到目的地的物流供应商

constructor-arg.value: SELECT * FROM t_sf_shipping_provider WHERE id IN (SELECT shipping_provider_id FROM t_sf_shipping_config WHERE shipping_temeplate_id = ( SELECT shipping_tmp_id FROM t_sf_product_shipping_temeplate WHERE item_id = :itemId ) AND dest_city = :areaId)
